Name: StereoPaint
About the game: StereoPaint is a VR 3d sculpting app that uses paint style interactions to create colorful voxelized models in real time. It allows the fluid and intuitive sculpting and manipulation of 3d models using various tools and volumetric brush shapes. In addition, StereoPaint provides various environments using reactive real time simulated physics to interact with your model.
